mapper.select: SELECT tr.id, tr.name, tr.description, tr.gmt_created AS gmtCreated, tr.gmt_modified AS gmtModified FROM t_role tr LEFT JOIN t_user_role tur ON tr.id = tur.role_id LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON tur.user_id = tu.id WHERE tu.id = #{userId}
